items.title: Engineer / Systems Administrator / Technical Support Representative
details: Created multiple systems for deploying the product as a service on-demand in LAMP environments.
Developed an automated software update data generation and versioning program in Python, which reduced the time to deploy a new version of the software product by over 80%.
Introduced numerous best practices to the project, including unit testing with PHPUnit and software documentation with JavaDoc-style comments.
Trained four other developers on the team.
Redesigned the software update process, improving its overall efficiency and stability, and giving it the ability to support multiple products.
Designed and built a REST-ful JSON API compatible with Zapier.
Created a license key and software registration web application.
Authored extensive and detailed documentation using MediaWiki.
Installed, configured and administered the company's Asterisk-based VoIP phone system and numerous other internal-use software components, scripts, networks, web applications, services and systems.
Assisted and solved problems for customers and end users.

Created Python-based data parsing, reduction and visualization tools for output from multithreaded simulations.
Introduced the practice of using version control to collaborator.
Authored extensive documentation using DoxyGen
